mapper.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ipinfo ip LEFT JOIN resipmapping rim ON ip.ip_sn = rim.ip_sn LEFT JOIN resinfo r ON r.res_serial_id = rim.res_serial_id LEFT JOIN ipcode c ON c."detailCode" = rim.ip_type_code

SELECT cd.detail_code AS "detailCode", cd.code_group_id AS "codeGroupId", cd.detail_code_name AS "detailCodeName" FROM commoncodedetail cd LEFT JOIN commoncode c ON c.code_group_id = cd.code_group_id WHERE c.code_group_id = 'IPT000'

WITH ipcode AS (
) SELECT ip.ip_sn AS "ipSn", ip.ip AS "ip", ip.ip_desc AS "ipDesc", ip."codeGroupId" AS "codeGroupId", ip."detailCode" AS "detailCode", ip."detailCodeName" AS "detailCodeName", ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY ip.ip_sn ) AS rn FROM ( SELECT ip.ip_sn, ip.ip, ip.ip_desc, c."codeGroupId", c."detailCode", c."detailCodeName", ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY ip.ip_sn ) AS rn FROM ipinfo ip LEFT JOIN resipmapping rim ON ip.ip_sn = rim.ip_sn LEFT JOIN resinfo r ON r.res_serial_id = rim.res_serial_id LEFT JOIN ipcode c ON c."detailCode" = rim.ip_type_code ORDER BY ip.ip_sn ) ip
SELECT detail_code AS "detailCode", detail_code_name AS "detailCodeName" FROM commoncodedetail

WITH commoncodes AS (
) SELECT r.res_serial_id AS "resSerialId", r.res_name AS "resName", r."resStatusCodeName" AS "resStatusCodeName", r.mgmt_dept_name AS "mgmtDeptName", r.rack_info AS "rackInfo", r.res_class_name AS "resClassName", r."ipTypeCodeName" AS "ipTypeCodeName", r.install_place_name AS "installPlaceName", r."detailAddress", r.ip_sn AS "ipSn", ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY r.res_serial_id ) AS rn FROM ( SELECT r.res_serial_id, r.res_name, cd_res_status."detailCodeName" AS "resStatusCodeName", r.mgmt_dept_name, r.rack_info, rc.res_class_name, rim.ip_sn, cd_ip_type."detailCodeName" AS "ipTypeCodeName", insp.install_place_name, concat(concat(insp.install_place_address, ' '), insp.install_place_detail_address) AS "detailAddress", ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY r.res_serial_id ) AS rn FROM resinfo r LEFT JOIN installplace insp ON insp.install_place_sn = r.install_place_sn LEFT JOIN commoncodes cd_res_status ON r.res_status_code = cd_res_status."detailCode" LEFT JOIN resipmapping rim ON r.res_serial_id = rim.res_serial_id LEFT JOIN ipinfo i ON rim.ip_sn = i.ip_sn LEFT JOIN commoncodes cd_ip_type ON rim.ip_type_code = cd_ip_type."detailCode" LEFT JOIN resclass rc ON r.res_class_id = rc.res_class_id ) r
